name: SharonChurchHoustonSundayService
0:
”Alexa, open sharon church houston”
”Alexa, ask sharon church houston for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start sharon church houston”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sharon church houston
des: Listen to the latest messages/sermons from the Sunday Worship Service. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
